author: jimh0806
title: Nice midtown location. Perfect for a night in the city.
text: Great mid-town location. Super friendly service at check in. We had a king bed, they offered a free upgrade to a double bed room that had a view of the Empire State building. We looked, but quickly switched back to the king bed room. No hassle. Rooms are very small, but engineered to perfection. Very clean. Modern d√©cor. Loved the bathroom. Roof top bar, Spy Glass - very nice with view of the Empire State building. I would say great for a night or two in the city. Not sure I would want to do a vacation week here. For that, I'd need a bit more space. Otherwise, this is a good value for the price.
